title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Special Events
body: Special Events       May 21 Memorial opens for 2016 Season!     May 30 Salute to the Fallen  Join the National Park Service Rangers in honoring America's fallen heroes    June 17-20 Put-in-Bay Maritime Celebration   June 18 Mayfly Festival   July 4 Freedom Concert and Fireworks   July 31 World Ranger Day   August 20-21 O.H. Perry's 231st Birthday   August 25-28 National Park Service Centennial   September 10-11 Historic Weekend Historic Weekend is the signature  event at Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial.  The traditional historic encampment will be on display with music and musket firing Saturday and Sunday 11 AM - 4 PM.
